name: Food and Energy Monopoly Disruption
description: Understanding how control over food and energy supplies is weaponized to engineer artificial scarcity, and how to counter it.

cards.title: The Food Supply Chain Manipulation
cards.description: How corporations and governments engineer food shortages.
bulletpoints: Artificial scarcity is created through food destruction and price manipulation.
Seed patents and GMO control give corporations power over food production.
Mass food recalls and regulatory barriers prevent local food independence.
cards.summaryText: Expose engineered food shortages via destruction, seed control, and blocked local independence.

cards.title: Energy Grid Warfare
cards.description: How energy supply chains are used for economic and political control.
bulletpoints: The fossil fuel industry maintains an illusion of scarcity for profit.
Renewable energy advancements are suppressed to maintain dependence.
Energy crises are often manufactured to justify price hikes and rationing.
cards.summaryText: Call out energy scarcity theater, note suppressed renewables, and see crises as manufactured control.

cards.title: Breaking Free from Food and Energy Tyranny
cards.description: Strategies for achieving food and energy independence.
bulletpoints: Decentralized food networks can eliminate dependency on monopolies.
Localized renewable energy systems reduce reliance on corporate grids.
Aquaponics, permaculture, and off-grid living provide long-term resilience.
cards.summaryText: Build decentralized food webs and local renewables so your resilience cuts the monopoly cord.
